engagements.topic: AI/ML in Product Strategy: From Concept to Execution
engagements.description: Presented on integrating AI/ML into product strategy and shared real-world case studies.
Discussed strategies for building and leading data-driven product teams.

testimonials.name: John Doe
testimonials.text: Vaibhav's mentorship was instrumental in helping me transition to a strategic product role. His insights on AI/ML integration were particularly valuable.

testimonials.name: Jane Smith
testimonials.text: Excellent guidance on product strategy and GTM execution. Highly recommend for anyone looking to level up their product leadership skills.
